definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
North China Incident of October-December 1935, a Japanese attempt to set up a puppet government in north China

sentences.english: She listened to the deep tone of Xu Huabei's voice.
sentences.chinese: 她听着徐华北低沉的嗓音。

sentences.english: The big clean-out that sweeps across China north began.
sentences.chinese: 席卷华北的大扫荡开始了。

sentences.english: Late Mesozioc Large-scale Intra-continental Rotation and Cratonic Destruction of the North China Block.
sentences.chinese: 华北地块晚中生代大规模陆内旋转与克拉通破坏。

sentences.english: Department of Geology and Mineral Resources of North China Petroleum Geological Exploration Bureau census …
sentences.chinese: 地质矿产部华北石油地质局第三普查勘探大队修配厂。

sentences.english: Hong Kong must integrate with the delta to stay competitive with northern and eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 香港必须和珠江三角洲整合，才能和华北及华东竞争。

sentences.english: The Company in North China are a large company has a position of relative strength.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是华北地区的一家较大的有雄厚实力的公司。

sentences.english: In north China, the thickness of Ordovician system is larger, the water-abundance is better.
sentences.chinese: 华北地区奥陶系厚度大，富水性强。

sentences.english: In North China, one of the more influential drama.
sentences.chinese: 是在华北地区较有影响的剧种之一。

sentences.english: The importance of "Huabei Accident" in history is re-appraised.
sentences.chinese: 重新评价了“华北事变”的历史地位。

sentences.english: The Sungshan forest tourist area is the northern region only state-level nature protection area.
sentences.chinese: 松山森林旅游区是华北地区唯一的国家级自然保护区。

sentences.english: Characterization of the North China People's support and the people's Liberation Army to fight a bloody battle scenes.
sentences.chinese: 刻画了华北人民支前和人民解放军浴血奋战的场景。

sentences.english: The drought and crop failure were the most serious in North China in a hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 那几年，华北平原发生了百年不遇的大旱灾和歉收。

sentences.english: Larix principis-rupprechtii forest is an important vegetation formation and has a large distribution area in Luya mountain reserve.
sentences.chinese: 华北落叶松林是芦芽山自然保护区的重要林型。

sentences.english: Therefore, the intrusions are located in the North China plate tectonically.
sentences.chinese: 因此，该岩带出露区的大地构造位置应归属华北板块。

sentences.english: Fight to the finish in defence of northern China and the seacoast.
sentences.chinese: 为保卫华北和沿海各地而血战到底。

sentences.english: The Honghuagou area of Chifeng City is tectonically located on the northern margin of the Inner Mongolian axis.
sentences.chinese: 其大地构造位置在华北地台北缘内蒙地轴东部。

definition: the three provinces of Northeast China, namely: Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2 ning2 Sheng3], Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3] and Heilongjiang Province 黑龍江省|黑龙江省[Hei1 long2 jiang1 Sheng3]
Hebei province (Hopeh) in north China surrounding Beijing, short name 冀, capital Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1]
old name for district of Hohhot city 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia
Northeast Plain, also called the Manchurian Plain
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
Peiping or Beiping (name of Beijing at different periods, esp. 1928-1949)
Shanxi 山西, Chahar 察哈爾|察哈尔 and Hebei 河北 (three provinces of the Republic of China in the period 1912-1936)
north/the northern part a country/China north of the Yellow River
